attributes.action: Change the way sex cases are trialed in court
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
it is so easy for girls to cry wolf in sex cases and once done so there told by the cps/police they cant change there mind if so there be prosecuted
. The jury should not be normal people of the street in these cases. Needs to be directors,Doctors and people of same level these cases are so complex they need people with great education to look at the facts not just what the crime is. There are too many people being wrongfully found guilty something has to change.
